Title: Calliope Mori
GameText: POWER - Apprentice Reaper: Calli deals 1 target 1 melee damage. You may activate 1 üíÄ REAP.

- 1 Hero takes their POWER PHASE.
- Destroy 1 Ongoing card.
- 1 Hero target deals 1 target 2 infernal damage.

Title: Calliope Mori
GameText: Power - Casual Rapper: Either discover 1 Ongoing card or activate 1 üé§ RAP. If a card was not played this way, Calli regains 3 HP.

Title: Calli's Mic
GameText:
POWER: Activate 1 üé§ RAP.
START PHASE
You may discard 1 card. If you discard a card this way, draw 1 card or play 1 Flow card.
Quote: Calliope Mori on this goddamn mic                    I don't want your fxxkin' money          I just want your life!

Title: Cheap Wine
GameText:
After this card is played, you may play 1 card.
After Calli is dealt damage, she may regain 2 HP. If she regains HP this way, use 1 power and destroy this card.
POWER: Draw 1 card. Activate 1 üé§ RAP.
Quote: By your side with my scythe and red wine.

Title: Could you please RIP?
GameText:
üé§ RAP
Play up to 2 Flow cards.
üíÄ REAP
Calli deals 1 target 4 infernal damage. Destroy this card.
Quote: I'm not asking for much                                 Do me a favor and die?               Gomen, shitsurei shimasu ga shinde kudasai~

Title: Death Scythe
GameText:
Damage dealt by Calli is irreducible.
POWER: Calli deals 1 target 2 melee and 1 infernal damage. Either activate 1 üíÄ REAP or draw 1 card.
Quote: My scythe is very hard, very rigid and very long.

Title: Death Sensei's Teachings
GameText:
After a Flow card is destroyed, you may activate 1 üíÄ REAP.
DRAW PHASE
You may draw an additional card this phase.
Quote: "Everyone dies in the end, Mori. We are the end. We do not make friends with the ones we bring across the river."

Title: end of a life
GameText:
üé§ RAP
Salvage 2 Flow cards.
üíÄ REAP
Destroy 1 target with 5 or fewer HP. Destroy this card.
Quote: Disappearing into the mist of 'never happened'        Is the me that I can never befriend          I let it go

Title: Guh!
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Discover 1 Flow card.
You may play 1 card or activate 1 üé§ RAP.
Quote: G to the U.H., saying give up haters!

Title: Murder is Kawaii
GameText:
Draw 1 card or discover 1 Flow card.
Activate up to 2 üíÄ REAP. 
Calli regains 4 HP.
Quote: Kurosu no koto ga tanoshi!           Murder is so fxxking kawaii!

Title: Reaper Rapper
GameText:
Draw 1 card or discover 1 Flow card.
You may activate 1 üíÄ REAP or 1 üé§ RAP.
If a Flow card is destroyed this way, you may play 1 Flow card.
Quote: Reaper or Rapper? Either is fine.

Title: Red
GameText:
üé§ RAP
Discover 1 Flow card.
üíÄ REAP
Calli deals each non-Hero target 2 infernal damage. Destroy this card.
Quote:
I'd rather kick it in the dungeon            
              'cause I'm that kind of beast                        
I'll bet my heart on the cards       
    because I trust me the least

Title: Scuffed Up Age
GameText:
üé§ RAP
Until your START PHASE, -1 damage dealt to Calli. Draw 2 cards.
üíÄ REAP
Destroy up to 2 Ongoing cards. Destroy this card.
Quote: Must be something surreal                             An endless dream we can't heal                        This rusted world wound up real             Still wanna love the way it feels

Title: Self Depreciating Rap
GameText:
Play or discover 1 Flow card.
Calli may deal herself 1 fixed psychic damage. If she does, play 1 Flow card. 
Calli may deal herself 1 fixed psychic damage. If she does, activate 1 üé§ RAP.
Quote: I'm filling syllables with curse words                   because I am an amateur              Everybody likes... self depreciating... rap.

Title: Streaming Reaper
GameText:
After you play a Flow card for the first time each turn, draw 1 card.
After Calli destroys a target, she regains 2 HP.
Quote:
Transmission live before you!                                  I‚Äôll reap in real-time                                   
Just don‚Äôt forget admission,             
That soul is still mine!
Attribution: -- Calli, grim reaper is a live-streamer

Title: Unalive
GameText:
üé§ RAP
Discard 1 card. Summon 1 Limited card.
üíÄ REAP
Calli regains 4 HP. Destroy this card.
Quote:
"                             My home,                                   a place I'll never know until I'm satisfied                           
To move forward,                       the lore is I must be void inside"

Title: Workaholic Business Lady
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
You may activate 1 üé§ RAP.
Calli may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play 1 card.
Quote:
Go ahead and BE sore, but I won't run       
Cause I'm a workaholic business lady, getting shxt done
